lexUnit.name: wait.v

document.description: Examples of the lemma wait from the MASC project for FN annotation
document.name: wait

lexUnit.definition: FN: to expect an event or phenomenon to occur

sentence.text: I am waiting for your call once you pick up USD5000.00 , Thanks

How are you today , My name is miss mealdred , I just went Through your profile and I have no options than letting you Know that I am interested in having a relationship with you , I will also like to Know you the more , you can send an email to me so that I can send you more details about my self Including my pictures.I am waiting for your reply in and God bless
I am writing this from my laptop computer in my hospital bed where I wait for my time to come .
He 's waiting for a thank you or some kind of acknowledgment of his help .
I will be waiting to hear from you .
I will be waiting for your mail as soon as possible .
I wait your you immediate respond Extend my greeting to your family .
And I think this is what they are waiting for .

Watching : `` Hollywood Movie Trailers And Teasers : State Of Play ( 2009 ) '' ( http://twitthis.com/nvnnfc ) I was waiting to hear back but I can do the show tomorrow and the May UG 933 lol you were right , Armageddon ( aerosmith ) was the first song Caught My Eye : `` Kindle 2 Causing Eye Strain ?
They 're waiting on an email reply from the Washington re-enacter at Arlington to hand down some decisions .
Thanks and waiting to read from you soonest .

I will be very happy if you could write me back , so that we can get to know each other better and share our feelings and see what happens in future , and also to view our photos as well , i will be waiting to hear from you .
